headline.main: RUSSIA'S SECRECY DELAYS U.S. HELP; American and British Experts in Moscow Unable to Get Full Data at the Front

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 26 -- Full-scale American aid to Russia is being delayed by the difficulty of obtaining from the Moscow government "full knowledge" of the Russian position, which President Roosevelt and Prime Minister Churchill insisted in their joint message to Premier Joseph Stalin was the prerequisite to the proper supplying of needs, several informed officials said today.
abstract: aid delay caused by Stalin reluctance to allow mil observers at front
